altername_name: The Legend of Shonan: The Legend of Red Star
name: Shonan Densetsu: Akai Hoshi no Densetsu
overview: A turn-based strategy game with fights between gangs of typical Japanese badass bikers that was created as a parody of Shonan Bakusozoku, a manga with this type of setting that has an anime adaptation, and in which the objective is to capture the base of the rival gang.
